ml_projects.name: LoRA_SFT
ml_projects.description: Fine-tuned the 135M-parameter SmolLM model using LoRA (Low-Rank Adaptation) for creative text generation. Conducted ablations on LoRA rank and base model (SmolLM vs GPT-2) using TRL and PEFT frameworks. Achieved a perplexity drop from 1.455 to 1.238 with only ~18 minutes of training on a T4 GPU. Includes visualizations of training curves, ablation comparisons, and generated samples.

ml_projects.name: Production RAG Pipeline
ml_projects.description: A production-ready, fully local RAG system: ingests PDFs into a FAISS inner-product index, serves retrieval via FastAPI, and generates cited answers with Flan-T5. Includes a minimal web UI, JSON endpoints (/search, /query), adjustable top_k/score_threshold, and pluggable device selection (CPU/MPS/CUDA).

ml_projects.name: ML Models for Mutation Impact Analysis
ml_projects.description: This project involves building machine learning models like CNN, GRU, Random Forest, and SVM to analyze the impact of mutations in genetic data. The models are trained using a combination of SMOTE and RandomUnderSampler for handling imbalanced data and feature engineering techniques tailored for mutation data.

ml_projects.name: Cancer Classification Using Gene Expression Data
ml_projects.description: A project focused on classifying different types of cancer using gene expression data. The classification models used include SVM, Random Forest, and CNN, with feature engineering and data preprocessing steps tailored for gene expression datasets.

ml_projects.name: Real-Time Object Detection
ml_projects.description: I developed a program that can detect 80 different objects in realtime using SSD MobileNet V2 FPNLite model.

ml_projects.name: Image Classification using Deep Learning
ml_projects.description: Developed a deep learning-based clothes classification model using PyTorch and VGG16, with image preprocessing, model training and validation, and accuracy assessment.

ml_projects.name: Graph Neural Networks for EEG
ml_projects.description: This repository explores the use of Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) for analyzing EEG data. By treating EEG channels as nodes in a graph, GNNs can capture the complex relationships between different brain regions, offering a powerful approach for EEG-based tasks.

ml_projects.name: LSTM-CNN for EEG
ml_projects.description: A project leveraging a hybrid LSTM-CNN model to analyze and classify EEG signals. The model is designed to capture both temporal and spatial features from the EEG data.

ml_projects.name: CNN-Transformer for EEG
ml_projects.description: This project combines CNNs and Transformers to process and classify EEG data. The CNN extracts spatial features while the Transformer model handles sequential dependencies, providing a robust solution for EEG signal analysis.

ml_projects.name: Machine Learning-Driven-CLV-Prediction
ml_projects.description: I did exploratory data analysis using python and built a predictive model that can accurately forecast the Customer Lifetime Value (CLV) for an e-commerce business.

ml_projects.name: Spotify Stock Analysis
ml_projects.description: I analyzed Spotify's current stock trends using Python tools. I also made predictions using Linear Regression.

openai_api_projects.name: Terms and Conditions Summarizer
openai_api_projects.description: This web application provides a concise, understandable summary of key points in Terms of Service documents, helping users understand their rights and obligations before agreeing to them. Utilizes advanced AI techniques to parse and summarize complex legal documents.

openai_api_projects.name: Smart Nutrition Assistant
openai_api_projects.description: Smart Nutrition Assistant is a web application designed to help users track and analyze their dietary habits with the help of AI. This tool uses the GPT-4 Vision API for food picture recognition and dietary advice, offering a user-friendly interface for meal tracking and nutritional insights..

openai_api_projects.name: Travel Planner
openai_api_projects.description: Travel Planner is an AI-powered application that helps users plan their trips efficiently. Utilizing the GPT-4 API, this tool offers personalized travel itineraries, suggestions, and insights based on user preferences and constraints.

misc_projects.name: Decaf Bytecode VM
misc_projects.description: Decaf is a compact language compiler and virtual machine built entirely in Python. It includes a hand-written lexer, Pratt parser, semantic resolver, and a bytecode compiler targeting a lightweight stack-based VM. The toolchain supports lexical scoping, immutability rules, function calls, disassembly tooling, and a CLI for compiling, executing, and tracing bytecode programs.

misc_projects.name: Pern Budget Tracker
misc_projects.description: Budget Tracker is a comprehensive web application designed to help users manage their finances efficiently by tracking their expenses and incomes. Built using the PERN stack, this app provides detailed financial insights and easy-to-use budget management tools.

misc_projects.name: Astro Mania
misc_projects.description: A challenging arcade game developed in Python, where players navigate a spaceship through various levels.

misc_projects.name: Tetris Rush
misc_projects.description: A fast-paced version of the classic Tetris game, built with Python to offer an engaging puzzle-solving experience.

misc_projects.name: Bit Manipulation
misc_projects.description: Educational project that demonstrates various bit manipulation techniques using C programming.

misc_projects.name: Blackjack
misc_projects.description: A web-based version of the Blackjack card game, designed to provide a fun and interactive gaming experience.

misc_projects.name: Crazy 8 Game
misc_projects.description: Digital version of the popular Crazy 8 card game, developed to offer both single and multiplayer modes.

misc_projects.name: Connect 4
misc_projects.description: A Python implementation of the classic board game Connect 4. This project allows two players to compete directly, demonstrating Python's utility in developing interactive applications.

misc_projects.name: Flight-Ticket Management System
misc_projects.description: A system for managing flight tickets using C++. It efficiently handles bookings and schedules, showcasing advanced C++ programming and data structure utilization.

misc_projects.name: Contact Management System
misc_projects.description: A C++ based application designed to manage personal and professional contacts. It incorporates basic file handling and data management principles to organize contact information efficiently.

misc_projects.name: Task Manager
misc_projects.description: A JavaScript-based web application for managing tasks. It allows users to add, delete, and organize tasks with an interactive and user-friendly interface.

misc_projects.name: Mern Budget Tracker Web App
misc_projects.description: This web app helps users track their expenses and manage their budget. Built using JavaScript, it provides insights into spending patterns with graphical data visualization.

misc_projects.name: Anonymous Course Review Site
misc_projects.description: A platform for students to anonymously submit and review feedback on courses and instructors. It fosters a culture of transparency and helps improve educational standards.
